transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Ji Shubham ji.
Customer: Aawaz ye aa rahi hai sir theek nahi.
Executive: Bilkul haan pehle se better hai. Main dekhiye main aap hi ko pareshan karunga. Mere ko problem kuch hogi toh main kisi aur se connect nahi karunga.
Customer: Theek hai aur aap mera manager change na ho. Haan ji mera manager change na ho kyunki managers baar baar change ho jaate hain. Toh aur problem hoti hai unko saari problem batani padti hai. Aap mujhe apna number bata dijiye ya message kar dijiyega mujhe bhi.
Executive: [inaudible]
Customer: Hai na aap mujhe message kar dijiye apna number hai na. Isi wale number pe double wale pe.
Executive: Haan ji haan ji.
Customer: 79 haan ji haan ji 79844 ji theek hai.
Executive: Haan aur mujhe ye bataiye ke jo mere abhi jo mere yahan pe days jo mere bekar gaye hain wo dekhiye IndiaMART ko pata hai seedha seedha. Aap mujhe ye bata dijiye ke wo days jo hain mere wo kaise mujhe wapis milenge na. Main wo puchna chah raha hun aapse.
Customer: Uska bataiye kyunki aisa hota hai dekhiye paisa toh le liya hai company ne. Aap sun rahe hain meri baat?
Executive: [inaudible]
Customer: Aap sun pa rahe hain mujhe?
Executive: Sir aawaz aa rahi hai mujhe aapki bilkul.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Jitendra ka phone hai wo. Toh aap mujhe bataiye na is bare mein bataiye mujhe aap pehle ek baar.
Executive: Theek hai dusra sir main aapko.
Executive: Karo zara sir.
Customer: Ji aawaz fir chali gayi aapki.
Executive: Theek hai batana yaar. Hello.
Customer: Haan ji itna itna disturbance kyun. Ji haan ji haan.
Executive: Disturbance kyun aa rahi hai.
Customer: Sir pata nahi yahan pe 9696 pe jo aapne call kiya tha sir wo concern main close kar de raha hun aur aise ek baar mein aapne jo mere ko bataya hai uske liye main ek baar discussion karke aapko personal number se message kar de raha hun aur call bhi kar rahe ho.
Customer: Main kar dunga aap mujhe bata dijiye theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai main aapki ye concern close kar de raha hun sir aapka. Theek hai na?
Customer: Haan concern close kar dijiye lekin main chah raha hun ke aap mujhe is cheez ka mujhe zaroor bataye. Ye bahut important hai.
Executive: Ji bilkul bilkul sir main.
Executive: Sir samajh gaya main baat karke batata hun sir waise dekhiye main aapko koi galat main koi galat hope nahi dunga sir possibility nahi hai. Lekin main dekho service ki time main nahi badha paunga ye main aapko.
Customer: Nahi aap company ko suno main bata raha hun aap Diamond app pe suniye baat aap suniye ke Diamond app mein aise aise issues chal rahe hain. Itne purane customer hain hamare wo keh rahe hain hum apna account hi hata lenge yahan se baat hi khatam.
Executive: Sir main baat kar sir main har tarike se.
Customer: Aur mere aur mere chaar paanch aur bhi mere aur bhi mere chaar paanch business friends hain mere main unse bolunga wahan se bhi hatao aur behtareen sa review do unko IndiaMART walon ko.
Executive: Sir sir dekhiye main kya keh raha hun sir main baat kar leta hun.
Customer: Recording kar lijiye is cheez ki haan.
Executive: Sir recording call pe hi baat ho rahi hai Shoaib ji. Haan ji haan ji.
Executive: Main main main main kya kar leta hun main ek baar ye dekh leta hun dekhiye sir service better karne ki main wo le sakta hun asurity mein ye aapko kar sakta hun ki har har har week aapko connect kar lun itni asurity mein le sakta hun ki har every week main aapko call karun.
Customer: Dekhiye meri baat suniye mera samay chala gaya peeche jo meri bylist meri nahi meri kitni bylist meri kitni waste gayi hai kya kholta main kuch bhi nahi uska toh batao na mere ko aise toh nahi hota jo peeche ho gaya usko chhod do aage se better karunga. Aise nahi hota na dekho aapke haath mein kuch nahi hai aap kya kar sakte ho mujhe batao Shoaib mein theek hai.
Executive: Main baat karke batata hun sir aapko rest main ye concern kar de raha hun close aapka.
Customer: Dekhiye mera aage bataiye main aapse baat kar raha hun dekhiye main aapse baat kar raha hun. Obviously main khali toh nahi hunga lekin fir bhi problem aa rahi hai mera time chala gaya na yahan pe. Abhi isse pehle maine IndiaMART pe paisa invest kara tha aur abhi IndiaMART pe maine apna time invest kar diya.
Executive: Ji bilkul.
Customer: Uska return kaun dega nahi na. Aap samajhte hain na baat ko aap bhi wahan pe aap apne aap apne job ke time mein khud personal toh baat nahi karte kisi se company allow nahi karti na.
Executive: Haan ji bilkul.
Customer: Isi tarah se mera mera business mujhe allow nahi karta. Lekin business se related loss ho raha hai toh baat karni pad rahi hai isliye main chahta hun.
Executive: Chaliye koi baat nahi ho gaya ho gaya sir. Main ek baar baat karke sir batata hun rest aapke paas ek feedback mail mere liye aayega sir ek aur cheez hai Shoaib ji ek feedback mail aapke paas aayega.
Customer: Main feedback aapko aise nahi dunga nahi main dunga feedback pehle mujhe aap uska batao ke kya ho sakta hai jo mera time waste ho gaya pehle jo meri bylist nahi aayi hai 10 tarikh haan ji.
Executive: Sir sir sir sir sir.
Customer: Nahi toh fir main fir main kisi aur se baat karunga fir main aur kya main aapse baat nahi karunga fir main dobara milaunga fir main customer care ko fir dobara jayega wahan pe call.
Executive: Sir isliye toh main ye customer care pe aap dobara lagayenge sir toh bhi toh mere paas hi aayega main apne senior se baat kara dunga agar chahiye toh lekin.
Customer: Haan lekin customer care mein ye toh record hoga na ke ek hi company baar baar customer care call kyun kar rahi hai kyunki usko personally treat nahi kara ja raha. Yaani wo satisfy nahi ho raha na apne manager se.
Executive: Bataiye sir bataiye kahan pe treat nahi kiya ja raha aapki call kab ignore kar di maine sir ek baar mujhe ye bataiye.
Customer: Koi baat nahi ab mere paas itna time nahi hai sorry for that aap mujhe is cheez ka bataye main koi baat nahi review de dunga.
Executive: Sir main mana nahi kar raha hun main baat karke batane ki main baat karke batata hun aapko lekin please aap thoda sa understand aap bhi kariye please sir request hai main matlab jo cheez possible hai wo main jo cheez nahi possible hai wo main kaise haan kar dun. Main baat karke ek baar bata deta hun aapko.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai okay okay.
Customer: Hello
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants assurance manager will not change.

- Wants to know how to recover wasted days.

- Expresses concern over wasted time and lost buyleads.

- Threatens to remove account and give negative reviews.



Resolution:

- Executive provided his contact number.

- Executive assured to discuss the issue internally.

- Executive assured to connect every week.

- Executive offered to connect with his senior.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will message and call the customer.

- Executive will close the concern.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- manager, wasted days, byleads, account removal, feedback
